tool.name: Hmmbuild
tool.description: Makes a HMM from reference alignement

param.name: input
param.label: Reference alignment in stockholm format

tool.help:
=========== Overview: ===========
Hmmbuild makes a HMM profile from a reference alignement (stockholm format).
Creates a .hmm alignment file.
